mapper.select: select sn, title, inq_cnt, rgtr_id, to_char(rgtr_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as rgtr_dt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY sn DESC) AS RNUM from brew.brewfaq order by sn desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(sn) + 1, 1) FROM brew.brewfaq
INSERT INTO brew.brewfaq ( sn ,title ,contents ,inq_cnt ,rgtr_id ,rgtr_dt ,mdfr_id ,mdfr_dt ) VALUES ( #{sn} ,#{title} ,#{contents} ,0 ,'admin' ,current_timestamp ,'admin' ,current_timestamp )
mapper.select: select sn ,title ,contents from brew.brewfaq where 1=1 and sn = cast(#{sn} as numeric)
